name: FGameplayEffectQuery
doc: Every set condition within this query must match in order for the query to match. i.e. individual query elements are ANDed together.

CustomMatchDelegate_BP: BP-exposed delegate for providing custom matching conditions.
OwningTagQuery: Query that is matched against tags this GE gives
EffectTagQuery: Query that is matched against tags this GE has
SourceTagQuery: Query that is matched against spec tags the source of this GE has
SourceAggregateTagQuery: Query that is matched against all tags the source of this GE has
ModifyingAttribute: Matches on GameplayEffects which modify given attribute.
EffectSource: Matches on GameplayEffects which come from this source
EffectDefinition: Matches on GameplayEffects with this definition
